Text.Page: Redorn would like to speak with you, if you have time to spare.
Redorn gave you some powerful accessories to complete your gear upgrade.

! It's been a long time!

I heard you've been outfitted with new gear.

Would you like some accessories as well?"Yes, thank you!

Excellent.

Let's start you out with a Twistshard Belt!
You'll need to tune it to your combat style, but you remember how that works, right? Select superior enchantment effects whenever possible for maximum efficiency..

That belt looks great on you!

Let me set you up with some more accessories: a necklace, earrings, and rings."Thank you."

I've prepared a selection of good stuff for you. If you care about Crits, use Carving accessories. If you're focused on Power, pick Prospect.

Whichever accessories you choose, you should know that just like your gear, they can be upgraded to more powerful versions in the future.
I hope you'll do well with your new accessories.
